column1: Hope everyone is getting the chance to enjoy time with friends and family during this long (snowy!) weekend! https://t.co/QiCzu1G0ix
https://t.co/jksi0QErfn

It’s no secret this record-setting campaign is PEOPLE POWERED!  ✅ more than 900K raised from over 5000 individual contributors ✅ majority of contributors in-state ✅ 87% of contributions less than $100 ✅ 100% ready to hold this seat in 2020

🙋🏻‍♂️Raise your hand if your phone autocorrects “spoons” to SPOONSS  ...Worth it to champion the SPOONSS Act signed into law by President Trump after the last representative couldn’t get it done. This law will bring new jobs and more money to back to NY-22!  https://t.co/Fug3OutUlr

From bringing jobs back to Upstate to improving mental health resources for our Veterans - we’ve been working hard to deliver results for NY-22 together.   And there’s more to look forward to in 2020!  Read about it here: https://t.co/pe808qK8S9

I was proud to be able to finally get my SPOONSS Act done and score a big win for a great upstate manufacturer. This shows what we’re able to accomplish by actually working together: https://t.co/oZlU5fXJUn

JUST SAY NO! The plan to end the @NYWFP line pushed by the Public Financing Commission will disenfranchise thousands of voters across the state and hurt representatives that are fighting for working families.
@claudiatenney @RepBrindisi @claudiatenney I might not agree with you on that (based on facts and your own record on this issue) BUT you’re one of my constituents and I will always fight for you.

THE CABLE GUY: If you’ve followed my uphill climb against Spectrum our rising rates locally and the company’s monopoly-like grip over our area you’ll be happy to know: the fight ain’t over. I won’t rest until they blink. https://t.co/EnoUEokMUv
@claudiatenney @RepBrindisi Lots of tweeting today. Shouldn’t you be busy looking for a charity to donate your latest pile of hidden foreign money. https://t.co/R7cGks8vFG #busted
Welp. I guess Elvis was right to reference “rushing in.”  But I can’t help.....working hard for you!   And I won’t stop.  https://t.co/0thgseK8zG

These kind of personal attacks are just wrong. Every member spends time away from family to serve and I am so grateful for my understanding wife Erica and our kids. Our politics need to be better than this. We are with you Joe and Amanda. @JoeCunninghamSC https://t.co/AT2HYstqwt
Had a great time at the Chenango County Fair Parade. Thanks to everyone who came out we didn't let the weather rain on our parade! https://t.co/oZ5jcB5beA
@claudiatenney @RepBrindisi Fact Check: only one Rep in this thread voted to add $2 trillion to the national debt while a Member of Congress and it wasn’t me. #LyingClaudia
Good luck to all the #Boilermaker15k runners! @Boilermaker15K https://t.co/CHd7wbCoXP
Permanently reauthorizing the 9/11 Victims Compensation Fund is the right thing to do. Now it’s time for the Senate to act. https://t.co/QIhPFBoW0c
INCREDIBLE ⚽️ 🇺🇸 Congrats to the women of @TeamUSA! #USWMNT https://t.co/XFXUC1kgNX

From helping farmers to lowering Rx drug cost to supporting veterans my focus is on Upstate NY & how we can make #NY22 the best place to live work & raise our families. I’m proud of our work these first 6 months & I promise to keep working to find solutions & deliver results. https://t.co/8fGjeSxUBj

Kicked off Broome County’s Summer Lunch program at the Binghamton Boys & Girls Club this week! I’m working to make sure all Upstate NY kids have access to healthy meals. Our bipartisan Kids Eat Local Act makes it easier for schools to purchase local food. https://t.co/zZI4PEsNty

Dairy is a critical part of the Upstate economy and we’re working hard to make sure local farmers have the tools and resources they need to succeed. Glad to be with Oswego farmers this week to help them navigate the new Dairy Margin Coverage program. https://t.co/o8smJTbg7E
Happy Independence Day! Thank you to our veterans servicemembers and military families who sacrifice so much for our freedoms. Proud to be an American today and every day. https://t.co/qNlYFkXoer
We must permanently #Renew911VCF. I’m calling on congressional leaders to bring the bill up for a vote this month. It’s the least we can do for our 9/11 heroes. https://t.co/5eJIYBGBOz

Great to be with the men and women of organized labor at this morning's @CNYLabor roundtable. Thank you for fighting to ensure hardworking Upstate New Yorkers have a voice in the workplace. https://t.co/f8nXdbk5vB
Thank you @StopBigMoney for your support and advocacy working to get dark money out of politics. https://t.co/j3YdiMpfCn
Congrats Jonny! We are so proud of you. https://t.co/zaH9zrKV6X
Homer Simpson can ‘eat my shorts.’ But at least try a @SaranacBrewery tour next time. https://t.co/Ot4Uwt7Z9O
Great to see so many friends at tonight’s @DemwomBC Chili Fest! https://t.co/TLHCHEKADB
You sent me to Washington to solve problems and get things done. My focus is - and always will be - Upstate New York. https://t.co/QNxTVJEBZl

Leah Jalbert of Endicott is battling a serious medical condition & cannot be exposed to any new germs. On top of countless medical bills her family is trying to build a sterile space where she can begin to recover. Here’s how you can help:  https://t.co/04UdHgbSnQ @DorianUsmc
No school no problem. Lily and Anthony are on the road today with dad touring #NY22 and we made a milk shake stop on beautiful Lake Ontario in Oswego County. https://t.co/V9qqdMTEh5
Joined New York Carpenters Local 277 at the Utica @StopTaxFraud rally to #StandUpToTaxFraud. #TFDOA https://t.co/RsB8vYF6if

I’m proud of the work we’ve done the last 100 days but there is so much left to do. I promise to stay laser-focused on solving problems and delivering results.   Thank you for giving me the chance to serve.
From fixing our broken health care system and lowering the cost of prescription drugs to improving education and creating good-paying jobs I’m working hard on issues important to you.
I've traveled to all eight counties and held four town halls. I’ve met Upstate New Yorkers in their workplaces schools restaurants and community centers. My top priority is listening to you.
100 days ago this week I was sworn in to represent #NY22 in Congress. Every morning I wake up thinking about what I can do for Upstate New York.

Great to join the Democratic Rural Conference convention in Syracuse. Thank you to everyone working hard to make sure every voice is heard. Congrats to #TeamBrindisi member @jonny_gerstein on being elected the new @CollegeDemsNY president! https://t.co/MyIu57zFtZ

Yesterday the House passed the #SaveTheNet Act to restore #NetNeutrality. Unfortunately Mitch McConnell has declared it "dead on arrival" in the Senate. This is not the way govt should work. We need leaders who will work together & debate ideas not stand in the way of progress. https://t.co/IBXvOsl8Yt

Promises made promises kept. From holding town halls to keeping the pressure on big corporate monopolies. From supporting our veterans to reaching across the aisle to solve problems. I’ll continue to work hard for the people of #NY22: https://t.co/VvQE8lpEN9

When so many voters rejected gutting the ACA I can’t fathom why they would press forward with attempts to repeal. Congress/President need to work together to stabilize the ACA protect pre-existing conditions and provide affordable options for everyone.  https://t.co/pqJ4AVaBF2

I will always put Upstate New Yorkers over party politics and special interests and you will always know where I stand on the issues. I'll keep working every day to solve problems and get things done. https://t.co/YSfl2ZgCed

DO NOT PASS GO! Monopolies are contributing to inequality in the United States. Read more about my ongoing fight with big cable monopolies like Charter/Spectrum that are taking advantage of consumers: https://t.co/WcWShuYMqf

On the campaign trail I pledged to go to Washington and help fix a broken system. Today I voted for #HR1 to help limit the influence of dark money in politics combat corruption and corporate influence and make it easier for Upstate New Yorkers to make their voices heard.

Happy #InternationalWomensDay! Today we celebrate the inspirational women who shape our communities our state & our nation. In Congress I'll keep working to stand up for #NY22 women - including fighting for the #PaycheckFairnessAct to ensure #EqualPay for equal  work. https://t.co/rvwexL6gjT
Breakfast with @BroomeDemocrats is the best way to start Parade Day! https://t.co/ReR4oNt2kg

Home to world class colleges and universities proximity to commercial drone test site in Rome a workforce eager for new opportunities and affordable home prices. Upstate New York is ready and willing to be open for business. https://t.co/f1F1kqTn74

Comments like this are disgraceful and blatantly anti-semitic and they have no place in our country’s discourse. I support Israel because of our common values. As leaders we should work to unite our country not further divide us. https://t.co/LQazykRroo

✅ ✅ ✅ Promises made promises kept. From holding town hall meetings to working across the aisle to get things done I’ll continue to put the interests of the people of #NY22 ahead of politics: https://t.co/foslKM7sYq
Thank you for visiting my campaign Twitter account. If your intention was to visit my official House of Representatives Twitter account please follow @RepBrindisi.
